knowledges.title: Types of cars
knowledges.content: As we all know, there are two types of cars. When we mention two types it's not models. Because there are many varieties of models. But when it comes to types one is the personally used car which we own it and other is public transportation car. Taxies and cabs which run on the road are listed under public transport.

knowledges.title: History part 1
knowledges.content:
Can you imagine! the very first moving vehicle was a machine that had only three wheels and 
was drawn by steam power. And it was first built in France. But these cars were not so effective. The reason being, the machine was very heavy which made the vehicle move very slow.

knowledges.title: Safety measures
knowledges.content: As we all know, cars are vehicles that move very fast. It is important that we should buckle up seat belt for safety purpose. It's not the person at the driving seat but everyone in the car should use the seat belt. Following the safety measures and traffic rules helps us in avoiding the road accidents.
